text.desc:

[WhenUse] Gain 1 [DefenseUp]
[WinDuel] Gain +2 [Vibration] Count

[WhenUse] Gain <style="highlight">2 [DefenseUp]
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has 4+ [Vibration] Count, Clash Power +1
[WinDuel] Gain +2 [Vibration] Count

[WhenUse] Gain 2 [DefenseUp]
[WhenUse] If target has 4+ [Vibration] Count, Clash Power +<style="highlight">2
[WinDuel] Gain +<style="highlight">3 [Vibration] Count

text.name: Combat Preparation
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WinDuel] Gain +2 [Vibration] Count
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] On 1 other ally with [DefenseUp], apply (([DefenseUp] on the ally)/3) [AttackUp] next turn (once per turn, max 3)

text.name: Combat Preparation
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] Gain 1 [DefenseUp] for every 2 [Vibration] Count on self (max 3)
[WhenUse] At 4+ [DefenseUp], Coin Power +1
[WinDuel] Gain +<style="highlight">3 [Vibration] Count
coinDescs: [WinDuelAttack] On 1 other ally with the lowest HP percentage, apply 2 [DefenseUp] next turn
[OnSucceedAttack] On 1 other ally with [DefenseUp], apply (([DefenseUp] on the ally)/<style="highlight">2) [AttackUp] next turn (once per turn, max 3)

text.name: Combat Preparation
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +3 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [DefenseUp] for every 2 [Vibration] Count on self (max 3)
[WhenUse] At 4+ [DefenseUp], Coin Power +1
[WinDuel] Gain +3 [Vibration] Count<style="highlight">
coinDescs: [WinDuelAttack] On <style="highlight">2 other allies with the lowest HP percentage, apply 2 [DefenseUp] next turn
[OnSucceedAttack] On <style="highlight">2 other allies with [DefenseUp], apply (([DefenseUp] on the ally)/2) [AttackUp] next turn (once per turn, max 3)

text.name: Fence
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [DefenseUp] for every 2 [Vibration] Count on self (max 2)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 3 [DefenseUp] on self (max 2)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] On 1 other ally with the lowest HP percentage, apply 3 [DefenseUp] next turn
[OnSucceedAttack] Consume up to 8 [Vibration] Count on self, and inflict the same amount of [Vibration] Count on target
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

text.name: Fence
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [DefenseUp] for every 2 [Vibration] Count on self (max <style="highlight">4)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 3 [DefenseUp] on self (max <style="highlight">3)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] On 1 other ally with the lowest HP percentage, apply <style="highlight">4 [DefenseUp] next turn
[OnSucceedAttack] Consume up to 8 [Vibration] Count on self, and inflict the same amount of [Vibration] Count on target
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

1101001.name: Begin Protection Mission
1101001.desc: At Combat Start, gain [DefenseUp] equal to [Vibration] Count on self (max 5)

1101021.name: Contract Target Protection
1101021.desc: Turn End: apply 1 [Agility] and 3 [DefenseUp] to 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage next turn
